page.title: 07A COUNTRY DAY.
page.content: SATURDAY,25TH MAY 1985.6.30A.M.-DAD GETS UP FEEDS AND WATERS THE CHICKENS, 12 DUCKS,10 LAMBS AND 8 SHEEP. HE OPENS UP BOTH ENDS OF THE TWO 40FT. POLYTHENE GREENHOUSES. 7.00A.M.- DAD LOADS THE BEDDING PLANTS INTO THE BACK OF THE ESTATE FOR BRADFIELD VILLAGE HALL MARKET. I FEED THE TWO CATS SNOWY AND SOOTY.9.30 WE SELL OUR PLANTS. 3.00P.M. DAD SEES A SWARM OF BEES.HE GETS HIS BEE SUIT,A SACK AND A LADDER. STEPHEN HELPS DAD SHAKE THE BEES INTO A SACK AND TIES THE TOP. NOW HE MUST PREPARE A NEW HIVE TO PUT WITH THE OTHER 4.5.00P.M. THE SHEARER ARRIVES. WE ROUND UP THE SHEEP AND SOON MUM HAS 8 NEW FLEECES FOR SPINNING. CHRISTOPHER MARNEY 10YRS.
